remarks: A subclass relationship depends only on a relation's ordered pairs. This version of ~ ssrel is restricted to the relation's domain. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2018.)
statement:
ssrel2 $p |- ( R C_ ( A X. B ) -> ( R C_ S <-> A. x e. A A. y e. B ( <. x , y >. e. R -> <. x , y >. e. S ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d S x y $.
